project_descr: Comprehensive strengthening of Institutional Management in Latin America and the Caribbean

outputs.output_descr: Civil servants and political, civil and social leaders in public institutions and organizations have in place eL4D solutions that enable the use of relevant knowledge to better perform their role under a HD perspective.

outputs.output_descr: Public institutions in LAC have in place effective strategies, systematized knowledge, and data / monitoring systems to carry out their mandates and provide public services.
Improved mechanisms, strategies and partnerships in the areas of South-South Cooperation, Triangular Cooperation and development effectiveness.
